Title: Binding from Five Poems (Quintet)
Description: This dark brown leather binding (with a flap) is original to the manuscript, Walters W.610. It has central ovals and pendants, all brushed with gold and dentelle-style doublures with filigree work, decorated central ovals, pendants, and cornerpieces in blue and gold.
Keywords: Islamic; Persian; Safavid; Book; Codex; Colophon; Illumination; Illustration; Manuscript; Medallion; Miniature; Ornament; Painting; Original Binding; Binding; Iran; Literature -- Poetry
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Iranian
